entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
